about:
I am a graduate student pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at Arizona State University. I have completed my Bachelor's in Computer Science & Engineering with honors from Indian Institute of Information Technology - Kottayam.

I had worked under Dr. Keshab Nath for my honor’s thesis project. My project focused on using generative networks to convert satellite images to interactive vector maps. We worked on a novel approach for converting satellite images to vector maps and then used other deep-learning techniques to highlight road intersections and separate buildings based on sizes. I had also worked under Dr. Rubell Marion Lincy G for my bachelor’s thesis project. My project was focused on finding optimal portfolio allocation based on the user's specified level of risk tolerance. We have implemented various stock price prediction models to achieve this, including gated recurrent unit networks, generative adversarial networks, and long short-term memory networks. Additionally, we have developed an innovative model for the same. Our research aims to forecast prices and allocate investments based on the predicted level of risk.

If you haven't guessed already, my interests broadly lie within the realms of artificial intelligence and machine learning. I'm always interested in discussing new ideas or learning about new projects. If you wish to contact me, please feel free to send an email to ataparia@asu.edu.

project.name: MSLSTMA : An efficient stock price prediction mechanism
project.description: We have developed a model for stock price prediction which employs OHLCV data to predict future stock price. We have compared its performance with other popular models and have found that our model outperforms them in terms of accuracy.

project.name: HPix : Vector Map Generation from Satellite Images
project.description: I have implemented a novel conditional generative adversarial network (cGAN) called HPix (Hierarchical Pix) that learns a mapping from input images to output images. I have trained this network to generate a vector base map from the satellite image. This network has outperformed various state-of-the-art models.

project.name: Learn It : E learning application
project.description: This is a Flutter Firebase application that provides a platform for teachers to share their knowledge through recorded lectures and students to access and engage with the content.

project.name: BOROMap : Online tool for lending and borrowing
project.description: This application enables users to easily lend or borrow items within their local community, with the frontend implemented using ReactJS, MapboxGL, and ExpressJS and the backend supported by MongoDB.
